techmeme.title: A US judge denies Musk's effort to halt OpenAI's for-profit shift, saying he failed to meet the burden of proof, but allows other aspects of the suit to proceed (Hayden Field/CNBC)
Musk's Fight With OpenAI to Be Fast-Tracked for Trial This Year (Malathi Nayak/Bloomberg)
Source: ByteDance plans to buy back US employee stock at ~$189.90 per share, up from ~$181 in a similar proposal in 2024, putting ByteDance's valuation at $312B (Bloomberg)
The Los Angeles Times removes its AI-powered "Insights" feature from a column after the tool tried to defend the Ku Klux Klan, just a day after its debut (Corbin Bolies/The Daily Beast)
CoreWeave acquires Weights & Biases, whose tools help developers build AI apps, sources say for ~$1.7B; Weights & Biases was valued at $1.25B in 2023 (The Information)
